course.title: MAT 2141 Honours Linear Algebra (3 units)
course.desc: Vector spaces, direct sums and complement of subspaces, linear maps, representation of linear maps by matrices, dual spaces, transpose mappings, multilinear mappings, determinants, inner products, orthogonal projections, the Gram-Schmidt algorithm. Eigenvalues and eigenvectors, diagonalization of symmetric matrices. The emphasis of this course is on proving all results.Course Component: Discussion Group, LecturePrerequisites: MAT1341, (MAT1348 or MAT1362 or MAT2362).
